data.prayer: Father, may the churches in Aurangabad, Bihar, India honor local leaders who work hard for the flock of God.
data.verse: Pay careful attention to yourselves and to all the flock, in which the Holy Spirit has made you overseers, to care for the church of God, which he obtained with his own blood.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Aurangabad, Bihar, India
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Spirit, help the disciples in the county of Aurangabad to find a person of peace today, like the Philippian jailer, who heard and was immediately baptized with his whole family.
data.verse: And they spoke the word of the Lord to him and to all who were in his house. And he took them the same hour of the night and washed their wounds; and he was baptized at once, he and all his family.

data.section_summary: On average, 5 babies will be born in the next hour to families who are far from God in Aurangabad, Bihar, India.
data.prayer: Jesus, reveal yourself to these new families.
Oh Lord, show the fatherless in the county of Aurangabad that you can be their real Father.
data.verse: I will be to you a Father. you will be to me sons and daughters,’ says the Lord Almighty.

data.prayer: Father, put the people who are lonely into families in the county of Aurangabad.
data.verse: God sets the lonely in families. He brings out the prisoners with singing, but the rebellious dwell in a sun-scorched land.

data.prayer: Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Bhoi Mallah Mewat people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Bhoi Mallah Mewat people.
Jesus, please bless the leaders of the the county of Aurangabad, Bihar, India who work hard at shepherding and guiding your people.
data.verse: With upright heart he shepherded them and guided them with his skillful hand.

data.prayer: Father, defend those who are loyal to your Word in the county of Aurangabad, even against fierce enemies.
data.verse: Though the wicked bind me with ropes, I will not forget your law.

data.prayer: Lord, help the people of Aurangabad, Bihar, India to discover the essence of being a disciple, making disciples, and how to plant churches that multiply.
